title: Valance, ca. 1815
medium:
Medium: cotton front, linen back, with cotton wadding between
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
description:
Valance (cut edge at left)  made of pieces printed fabric and quilted.
Some pieces also mounted on the back. 
Front faded, back less so.
Scenes of Scottish peasant life.

tombstone.epitaph:
Valance, ca. 1815.
ca. 1815. Medium: cotton front, linen back, with cotton wadding between
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-82.
